_comments.TASK_MANAGER_FILE_PATH: Path to your tasks file. Can be absolute or relative. Supports both .json and .yaml extensions.
_comments.TASK_MANAGER_BASE_DIR: Optional: Custom base directory for resolving relative paths. Defaults to process.cwd().
_comments.ARCHIVE_FILE_PATH: Optional: Path to archive file. Defaults to [taskfile-name]-archive.[ext] in same directory.
_comments.ARCHIVE_MODE: Archive mode: 'manual' (default) or 'auto-on-complete' for automatic archiving.

formats: tasks.yaml (YAML format - recommended for multiline content)
